We'll be presenting our tutorial on the workshop day, November 2nd. You can find our paper at the [arxiv website](https://arxiv.org/abs/2111.00960) and the [conference proceedings](https://dl.acm.org/doi/abs/10.1145/3486640.3491392). We hope to see you there! <em>Update:</em> gtfs2vec has been implemented in our Spatial Representations for Artificial Intelligence library - [SRAI](https://kraina-ai.github.io/srai).
